description: Inspired by a vintage piece, this sweater is made with Italian yarn that is blended with recycled cotton denim. It features a patch pocket at the left chest that is finished with the same signature metal rivets that are on Polo jeans.
fitting_details: Regular Fit: Wider at the chest while still maintaining a modern silhouette.
Size medium has a 26" body length (front and back), a 19.75" shoulder, a 41.5" chest, and a 23" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 0.5" between sizes.
Crewneck. Long sleeves with rib-knit cuffs. Left chest patch pocket with signature metal rivets. Rib-knit hem.
This product is made with recycled cotton. Utilizing recycled cotton reduces our dependence on resource-intensive virgin raw materials and diverts textile waste from ending up in landfills.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
